items.sentence: I was quite upset at the sudden change in the plan.
I mistook you for your sister when I first saw you.
I had gone some distance before I missed my wallet.
I heard a strange sound coming from the room above.
There's a supermarket not too far from Tom's house.
I wonder where in the world Tom could be right now.
I think Tom is clever enough to solve this problem.
We'll make a restroom stop at the next gas station.
We'll just have to wait and see how things pan out.
I'll bet you can't guess what happened to me today.
